keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
map k scrollPageUp
map j scrollPageDown
map K scrollUp
map J scrollDown
map gk scrollFullPageUp
map gj scrollFullPageDown

map h goBack
map l goForward
map a goBack

unmap gt
unmap gT
map H previousTab
map L nextTab

unmap zH
unmap zL
map s scrollLeft
map d scrollRight
map S scrollToLeft
map D scrollToRight

unmap [[
unmap ]]
map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext

unmap <<
unmap >>
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map ; passNextKey
map z passNextKey

unmap <a-f>
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map gb LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map gq LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue

map w moveTabToNewWindow
map W LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

map R reload hard

unmap <a-p>
map gp togglePinTab

unmap <a-m>
map M toggleMuteTab

unmap gu
unmap gU
map u goUp
map U goToRoot

unmap ge
unmap gE
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map x removeTab
map gh closeTabsOnLeft count=1
map gl closeTabsOnRight count=1
map gH closeTabsOnLeft
map gL closeTabsOnRight
map gx closeOtherTabs
searchEngines:
wk: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wiki
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
am: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=%s Amazon
dd: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
